survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Indoor Vertical Farming Kits Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in indoor vertical farming kits, focusing on ease of use, product quality, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor vertical farming kit?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor vertical farming kit?

questions.question_text: Which features of your indoor vertical farming kit do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture feature usage accurately.

script.question_text: Which features of your indoor vertical farming kit do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your indoor vertical farming kit?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your indoor vertical farming kit?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your indoor vertical farming kit to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency with Q1.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your indoor vertical farming kit to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future versions of indoor vertical farming kits?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture innovative suggestions. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future versions of indoor vertical farming kits?
